com.davidbracewell.collection

Interface Counter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of item.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentMapCounter, ForwardingCounter, HashMapCounter, TreeMapCounter

    public interface Counter<T>

    Provides double-based counts for items.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
